<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Traitorous Thoughts](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2297)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you hold this sleek, shiny gray wand, you hear a faint chorus of overlapping whispers.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_mind probe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=193). The first time the target rolls a success at a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to mislead your probe, it gets a result one step worse than it rolled. This means you learn the answer if the target's Deception check would have succeeded, and you learn nothing rather than believing a falsehood if the check would have been a critical success.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _mind probe_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of Traitorous Thoughts
